name: linkorb/flex-auth
description: This libraries provides flex auth for symfony security in runtime

suggest.userbase/client: Required for support userbase type format
suggest.symfony/doctrine-bridge: Required for support flex-auth entity type format. Prefer ^4.0
suggest.symfony/http-foundation: Required for support flex-auth jwt type format. Prefer ^4.0
suggest.firebase/php-jwt: Required for support flex-auth jwt type format. Prefer ^5.0
